mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PET_NOTICE VALUES (seq_pet_notice_no.nextval, #{happenDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{happenPlace, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{kindCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{colorCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{age, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{weight, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{noticeNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{noticeSdt, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{noticeEdt, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{popfile, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{processState, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sexCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{neuterYn, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{specialMark, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{careNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{careAddr, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{careTel, jdbcType=VARCHAR})

INSERT INTO shelter VALUES (seq_shelter_no.nextval, #{careNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{divisionNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{saveTrgtAnimal, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{careAddr, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{weekOprStime, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{weekOprEtime, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{weekCellStime, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{weekCellEtime, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{weekendOprStime, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{weekendOprEtime, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{weekendCellStime, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{weekendCellEtime, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{closeDay, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{careTel, jdbcType=VARCHAR})

INSERT INTO WITH_PET VALUES (seq_with_pet_no.nextval, #{building, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{category3, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{road, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tel, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{homepage, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{day_off, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hour, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parking, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{with_pet_info, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{only_pet_info, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pet_size, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pet_limit, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inside, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{outside, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{extra, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
